page.title: 04A DAY IN MY LIFE.
page.content:
I wake up at 7.00 AM. At 7.05 AM. I get out of bed and put my clothes on. Then I have my breakfast, that consists of Shreddies (a breakfast ceareal) or beans on toast.
After that I watch " Good Morning Britain" on television. At 8.40 AM. I go to school. We go in at 9.10 AM. First thing we do is have a talk. Then we see a television programme. After that we write a story. Then at 10.30 AM. we have playtime. We come in at 10.45 AM. Then we do maths. After that we do English.
At 12.00 PM. I walk home to have my lunch. I usally have a cob a packet of crisps and a cup of tea. I come back to school at 12.50 PM. and we go in at 1.15 PM.
